name: Deski
description:
Deski  is a  board inspired by Kenyan game  that really doesn't have name .  So we decided to name it deski because it's mostly played on a  Desk  (usually in school  ) or make shift boards .

It's Game Mechanics  are like that of checkers and chess,  so it shouldn't be hard for a  beginner .

Download it and if your new  to the game,  instructions on how to play it are on the about screen. 

Play safe !!!
